validator_address.description: validator_address defines the validator address to query for.

starting_height.description: starting_height defines the optional starting height to query the slashes.

ending_height.description: starting_height defines the optional ending height to query the slashes.

pagination.description: pagination defines an optional pagination for the request.

QueryValidatorSlashesRequest.title: Query Validator Slashes Request
QueryValidatorSlashesRequest.description: QueryValidatorSlashesRequest is the request type for the Query/ValidatorSlashes RPC method

key.description: key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key should be set.

offset.description: offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable. It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should be set.

limit.description: limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page. If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

count_total.description: count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

reverse.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title: Page Request
cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.description: PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient pagination. Ex:  message SomeRequest {          Foo some_parameter = 1;          PageRequest pagination = 2;  }
